briefTitle: Partial Breast Versus Whole Breast Irradiation in Elderly Women Operated on for Early Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Partial Breast Versus Whole Breast Irradiation to Women ≥ 60 Years Operated With Breast Conservation for Early Breast Cancer: a Randomized Fase II Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women 60 years or older
* operated for unilateral, unifocal early breast cancer pT1, pN0, M0, grade I or II, positive estrogen and/or progesterone receptor, HER2 negative

Exclusion Criteria:

* lobular carcinoma
